actions.name: Mighty Dynamo

cost.trigger: The user is hit by an Electric-Type attack or a Special Steel-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by an Electric-Type attack or a Special Steel-Type attack.

Effect: The user takes no damage from the triggering attack and is unaffected by its effects. Then, the user gains +1 SPATK and SPD Stages for 5 Activations.

actions.name: Mighty Dynamo
actions.description: Passive: The user's [Pulse] and [Ray] attacks have a 50% increased Range (minimum 1), and have their Power increased by 50%.

system.description:
